trans-unit.source: Represents a collection of <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.Explorer.IExplorerNode" /> objects.
trans-unit.target: 表示 <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.Explorer.IExplorerNode" /> 对象集合。

trans-unit.source: The ID of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.Explorer.IExplorerNodeType" /> to use to define the behavior of the new node.
trans-unit.target: 要用于定义新节点的行为的 <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.Explorer.IExplorerNodeType" /> 的 ID。

trans-unit.source: The text to display with the new node.
trans-unit.target: 要在新节点旁显示的文本。

trans-unit.source: A dictionary of objects to be added to the <see cref="P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.IAnnotatedObject.Annotations" /> property of the new node.
trans-unit.target: 要添加到新节点的 <see cref="P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.IAnnotatedObject.Annotations" /> 属性的对象的字典。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.Explorer.IExplorerNode" /> and adds it to the collection.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个新的 <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.Explorer.IExplorerNode" />，并将其添加到集合中。

trans-unit.source: The new <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.Explorer.IExplorerNode" />.
trans-unit.target: 新的 <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.Explorer.IExplorerNode" />。

trans-unit.source: For more information about using the <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.IAnnotatedObject.Annotations%2A> property, see [Associating Custom Data with SharePoint Tools Extensions](/visualstudio/sharepoint/associating-custom-data-with-sharepoint-tools-extensions.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关使用<xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.IAnnotatedObject.Annotations%2A>属性，请参阅[关联与 SharePoint 工具扩展的自定义数据](/visualstudio/sharepoint/associating-custom-data-with-sharepoint-tools-extensions.md)。

trans-unit.source: The ID of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.Explorer.IExplorerNodeType" /> to use to define the behavior of the new node.
trans-unit.target: 要用于定义新节点的行为的 <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.Explorer.IExplorerNodeType" /> 的 ID。

trans-unit.source: The text to display with the new node.
trans-unit.target: 要在新节点旁显示的文本。

trans-unit.source: A dictionary of objects to be added to the <see cref="P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.IAnnotatedObject.Annotations" /> property of the new node.
trans-unit.target: 要添加到新节点的 <see cref="P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.IAnnotatedObject.Annotations" /> 属性的对象的字典。

trans-unit.source: A value that is used to sort the current node among sibling nodes.
trans-unit.target: 用来对同级节点之间的当前节点排序的值。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.Explorer.IExplorerNode" /> with the specified sort position among sibling nodes.
trans-unit.target: 使用同级节点之间指定的排序位置创建新的 <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.Explorer.IExplorerNode" />。

trans-unit.source: The new <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.Explorer.IExplorerNode" />.
trans-unit.target: 新的 <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.Explorer.IExplorerNode" />。

trans-unit.source: For more information about using the <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.IAnnotatedObject.Annotations%2A> property, see [Associating Custom Data with SharePoint Tools Extensions](/visualstudio/sharepoint/associating-custom-data-with-sharepoint-tools-extensions.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关使用<xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.IAnnotatedObject.Annotations%2A>属性，请参阅[关联与 SharePoint 工具扩展的自定义数据](/visualstudio/sharepoint/associating-custom-data-with-sharepoint-tools-extensions.md)。

trans-unit.source: The text to display with the new folder node.
trans-unit.target: 要在新的文件夹节点旁显示的文本。

trans-unit.source: The icon to display with the new folder node.
trans-unit.target: 要在新的文件夹节点旁显示的图标。

trans-unit.source: The delegate to execute to create child nodes for the new folder node.
trans-unit.target: 执行以为新文件夹节点创建子节点的委托。

trans-unit.source: This delegate is executed automatically when the <see cref="E:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.Explorer.IExplorerNodeEvents.NodeChildrenRequested" /> event for the new folder node is raised.
trans-unit.target: 当引发新文件夹节点的 <see cref="E:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.Explorer.IExplorerNodeEvents.NodeChildrenRequested" /> 事件时，此委托将自动执行。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new folder node and uses the specified delegate to create child nodes for the new folder node.
trans-unit.target: 创建新的文件夹节点并使用指定委托来为新的文件夹节点创建子节点。

trans-unit.source: The new folder node.
trans-unit.target: 新的文件夹节点。

trans-unit.source: When you use the <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.Explorer.IExplorerNodeCollection.AddFolder%2A> method to create a folder node, you can pass an <xref:System.Action%601> delegate that will be called automatically to create the child nodes for the new folder node.
trans-unit.target: 当你使用<xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.Explorer.IExplorerNodeCollection.AddFolder%2A>方法来创建一个文件夹节点中，你可以将传递<xref:System.Action%601>将自动调用，以创建新的文件夹节点的节点的子级的委托。

trans-unit.source: The parameter of this delegate is a <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.Explorer.IExplorerNode> object that represents the folder node to which you can add children.
trans-unit.target: 此委托的参数是<xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.Explorer.IExplorerNode>表示可向其中添加子级文件夹节点的对象。

trans-unit.source: For a walkthrough that demonstrates how to specify a delegate when you create a folder node, see [Walkthrough: Extending Server Explorer to Display Web Parts](/visualstudio/sharepoint/walkthrough-extending-server-explorer-to-display-web-parts.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关演示如何创建文件夹节点时指定的委托的演练，请参阅[演练： 扩展服务器资源管理器显示 Web 部件](/visualstudio/sharepoint/walkthrough-extending-server-explorer-to-display-web-parts.md)。
